title: Q13 Revision G/U MC
prompt: Which of these is the <u>most</u> accurate and effective revision to the sentence?
description:
Read this sentence.

The deepest part of the trench is called the Challenger Deep, a small valley at the southern end where the ocean floor is seven miles almost below the surface of the ocean.
feedback: The correct answer is “The deepest part of the trench is called the Challenger Deep, a small valley at the southern end where the ocean floor is almost seven miles below the surface of the ocean.” The important difference between the answer choices is the placement of the word “almost.” The word "almost" can be an adverb or a adjective. Where it's placed in the sentence shows what "almost" modifies. In this case, "almost" modifies "seven." The word "almost" should be near the word "seven."
